verses.name: Ephesians 1:20
verses.text: Which he wrought in Christ, when he raised him from the dead, and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places,

verses.name: Ephesians 1:21
verses.text: Far above all principality, and power, and might, and dominion, and every name that is named, not only in this world, but also in that which is to come:

verses.name: Ephesians 1:22
verses.text: And hath put all things under his feet, and gave him to be the head over all things to the church,

verses.name: Ephesians 1:23
verses.text: Which is his body, the fulness of him that filleth all in all.
